title2: I'm Saleh. I build things for the web
title3: Aloha ðŸ‘‹ I'm Saleh. I build things for the web
p1: My name is pronounced the way it is spelled, so you're most probably getting it right, but in case you're not, no worries, my computer keeps trying to autocorrect it, so I don't have high expectations
p2: I was born and raised in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, and currently live in ðŸ—½NYCðŸ—½ where I work as a software engineer. I really enjoy computering and the prospects of positive change that are possible with the advancement of technology to make the world a better, more just place
p3: Besides tech, I fantasize about travelling and visiting pretty much everywhere in the world. I also really enjoy reading and going outdoors and learning new things and exploring new places and climbing trees and seeing my friends and making new ones and watching movies and tutoring my little siblings. I'd say most of the time I'm usually doing one of those things. And I also pretend to speak french and a few other languages
p4: I don't use social media, but I'd be very happy to connect over email
